EmailTemplate.name: 202010_Global_CH_RDR7000_Webinar_DR.202010_Global_CH_RDR7000_Webinar_Email1_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date - Honeywell IntuVue RDR7000 Weather Radar System Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Manager, Steve Gomez, for our upcoming webinar – IntuVue RDR7000 Weather Radar System!
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will provide information on the new technology present in the IntuVue RDR7000 Weather Radar System and how it can improve operator understanding of the weather around the aircraft to enable more efficient, comfortable and safer flights.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in identifying global opportunities for this upgrade, status of STCs being developed to allow the RDR7000 installation as well as Sales Bulletin promotional pricing available.
DATE October 20th, 2020
TIME 08:00 a.m. Arizona Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
HOSTED BY Stanton Henderson
PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_LH8yoEgeQHqAIzBCGn_hOw]]>
This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Channel-Partner-Webinars-Opt-In.html]]> to let us know!
